thread.title: Great for a long weekend Paris trip
thread.title_full: Great for a long weekend Paris trip - Review of TIMHOTEL Paris Gare De Lyon, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Cyrus_thomas
title: Great for a long weekend Paris trip
text:
Good location, clean rooms, clean bath, Metro Station 300m away, a lot of restaurants near the hotel, very friendly staff, breakfast excellent, no loud noise, all the hot spots are very easy to reach.
Room Tip: Clean room and bath See more room tips
